segments.text: I see the water overflowing, and I can’t help but laugh at the absurdity of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, and it’s almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and I love how sneaky they’re being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s stool is about to tip, but he’s determined to get that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting so patiently, and it’s adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is like a cartoon, and I can’t stop smiling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading, but no one seems to notice or care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for the woman to realize what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are so focused on their mission that they don’t see the mess around them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is the funniest thing I’ve seen all day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm outside and the chaos inside is perfect.
segments.speaker: PAR
